edu.ncsu.csc216.howlondemand.platform

Class HowlOnDemandSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.howlondemand.platform.HowlOnDemandSystem

  • public class HowlOnDemandSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    Concrete class that maintains the Station list and handles CommandValues from the GUI and internal methods.
    Author:
    kavitpatel

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addTrackChunkToBuffer(TrackChunk trackChunk)
      Add TrackChunk to the end of the buffer; if the buffer does not have room to add the additional TrackChunk, the system should IAE.
      boolean bufferHasRoom()
      Should return true if the buffer list has room to add additional TrackChucks addTrackChunkToBuffer should attempt to add the TrackChunk parameter passed to the method to the end of the buffer, if the buffer does not have room to add the additional TrackChunk, the system should throw a IAE.
      TrackChunk consumeTrackChunk()
      Remove the chunk at the 0 index only if the buffer has at least 1 , trackChuck stored in it, otherwise it should throw an IAE.
      void executeCommand(Command command)
      Provides the GUI with a method to call when the user presses a button.
      int getChunkSize()
      Gets chunk size.
      AudioTrack getCurrentAudioTrack()
      Tradiontal getter method gettin currentAudioTrack.
      Station getCurrentStation()
      Provides information to the GUI getting current station.
      static HowlOnDemandSystem getInstance()
      Checks to see if the singleton field has been created, if not, it should create a new instance of HowlOnDeamndSystem, then return the singleton.
      HowlOnDemandSystemState getState()
      Gets state.
      java.util.ArrayList<Station> getStations()
      Provides list of stations.
      boolean hasNextTrackChunk()
      Should return true if the buffer is not empty, false otherwise.
      void loadStation(Station station)
      Load station and if equal to null throws IAE.
      void loadStationsFromFile(java.lang.String file)
      Passes the String parameter to the StationsReader class provided through the AudioXML library.
      void reset()
      Reset the system.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Should be appropriately built and include the FSM's current state and the current size of the chunks collection.

      • consumeTrackChunk

        public TrackChunk consumeTrackChunk()
        Remove the chunk at the 0 index only if the buffer has at least 1 , trackChuck stored in it, otherwise it should throw an IAE.
        Returns:
        track chunk to be consumed for system.

      • hasNextTrackChunk

        public boolean hasNextTrackChunk()
        Should return true if the buffer is not empty, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        is there next track chunk exist in buffer?

      • addTrackChunkToBuffer

        public void addTrackChunkToBuffer(TrackChunk trackChunk)
        Add TrackChunk to the end of the buffer; if the buffer does not have room to add the additional TrackChunk, the system should IAE.
        Parameters:
        trackChunk - add TrackChunk if full throw IAE.

      • bufferHasRoom

        public boolean bufferHasRoom()
        Should return true if the buffer list has room to add additional TrackChucks addTrackChunkToBuffer should attempt to add the TrackChunk parameter passed to the method to the end of the buffer, if the buffer does not have room to add the additional TrackChunk, the system should throw a IAE.
        Returns:
        Is buffer full ?

      • getState

        public HowlOnDemandSystemState getState()
        Gets state.
        Returns:
        system state

      • executeCommand

        public void executeCommand(Command command)
        Provides the GUI with a method to call when the user presses a button. This method then passes the interaction to the internal FSM.
        Parameters:
        command - to be executed called from gui or internal FSM
